title: env.security_event_store_v1
description: Envelope for storing a MOVA security event episode in a security log or store.

roles.description: Who records the event and which store receives it.

producer.description: Identifier of the producer of this event (service id, guard id, etc.).

security_store.description: Identifier of the target security store or log.

meta.description: Optional metadata for routing: correlation ids, partition keys, etc.
